values: Not Destined for Wrath: Funeral Meditation for Doris LindbergNot Destined for Wrath: Funeral Meditation for Doris Lindberg

The wrath of God is real, but so is the hope that, in Christ, God has not destined us for wrath but to obtain everlasting salvation.The wrath of God is real, but so is the hope that, in Christ, God has not destined us for wrath but to obtain everlasting salvation.
